name: Sokoban!
description:
Sokoban!

Do you enjoy pushing boxes? Do you enjoy puzzles? Then some good ole' fashion Sokoban box pushing seems to be a perfect fit for you! Can you organize our unnecessarily complex warehouse with boxes in their right places?

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Move -> WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Undo -> Z
  • Reset level -> R

CURRENT VERSION:

The game currently contains 4 levels. While "finished", work will continue to be done to add extra levels in the overworld for more variety and different kinds of challenges. Any suggestions or recommendations feel free to let me know :)

CREDITS:

  • Programming & Design - Apollopower
  • Art - Kenney
  • Music - Bensound.net
